search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Stripe (stripe.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official URL for Stripe's pricing page is: [https://stripe.com/pricing](https://stripe.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

Get started
===========

*   [Libraries and SDKs](https://docs.stripe.com/development)

Guides
======

*   [Manage subscriptions](https://docs.stripe.com/billing) 
*   [Send payments](https://docs.stripe.com/connect)

*   [Build on Stripe Apps](https://stripe.com/apps) 

*   [Support center](https://support.stripe.com/?referrerLocale=en-us) 
*   [Support plans](https://stripe.com/support-plans) 
*   [Guides](https://stripe.com/guides) 
*   [Customer stories](https://stripe.com/customers) 

*   [Blog](https://stripe.com/blog) 
*   [Sessions](https://stripe.com/sessions) 
*   [Contact sales](https://stripe.com/contact/sales) 

*   [Jobs](https://stripe.com/jobs) 
*   [Newsroom](https://stripe.com/newsroom) 

*   [Stripe Press](https://press.stripe.com/) 
*   [Become a partner](https://stripe.com/partners/become-a-partner) 

Pricing built for businesses of all sizes
=========================================

Standard
========

Access a complete payments platform with simple, pay-as-you-go pricing. No setup fees, monthly fees, or hidden fees.

[Start now](https://dashboard.stripe.com/register) 

2.9% + 30¢
----------

per successful transaction for domestic cards

Custom
======

Design a custom package— available for businesses with large payments volume or unique business models.

[Contact sales](https://stripe.com/contact/sales) 

*   IC+ pricing

*   Volume discounts

*   Multi-product discounts

*   Country-specific rates

What’s included
===============

Get [100+ features](https://stripe.com/payments/features) out of the box with Stripe’s integrated per-transaction pricing.

Tools to build optimized checkout flows
=======================================

*   Embeddable checkoutAdd a beautiful checkout form with one line of JavaScript.
    
*   Custom UI toolkitDesign your own pixel-perfect checkout flows across desktop and mobile.
    
*   Simplified PCI complianceUse Stripe Checkout or Elements to qualify for the simplest method of PCI validation (SAQ A).
    
*   Invoice supportCreate and send invoices with payments built-in.
    

Global payments with a single integration
=========================================

*   135+ currenciesProcess charges and display prices in your customer’s preferred currency to increase conversion.
    
*   Local payment methodsFrom Alipay to iDEAL, you can support dozens of popular payment methods with a single integration.
    
*   Global supportBusinesses in 25+ countries can accept payments from customers anywhere in the world.
    
*   Subsidiary supportSet up local Stripe accounts to maximize acceptance rates and reduce cross-border and conversion costs.
    

Comprehensive security and rigorous compliance
==============================================

*   Comprehensive security and rigorous complianceUse our libraries to collect payment information without sensitive data ever hitting your servers.
    
*   Data security and encryptionSiloed infrastructure for the storage, encryption, decryption and transmission of card data.
    
*   Regulatory licenses worldwideStripe is certified to the highest industry standards and has obtained regulatory licenses around the world.
    
*   Secure Dashboard accessSecure access with granular permissions, two-step authentication, and U2F keys.
    

Fast, predictable payouts to your bank accounts
===============================================

*   Control payout timingOpt to receive transfers on a rolling basis, weekly, or monthly.
    
*   Unified payoutsGet unified payouts across all the different payment methods and currencies you accept.
    
*   Like-for-like settlementIn select regions, get paid out in your preferred currencies.
    
*   Transparent payoutsSee upcoming payouts, expected deposit dates, payout history, and more in the Dashboard.
    

Financial reconciliation and reporting
======================================

*   Real-time reportingGet real-time information about charges, fees, refunds, and transfers from the Dashboard or via the API.
    
*   Unified reportingView reports across all the different payment methods and currencies you accept.
    
*   Deposit taggingEvery deposit is tagged with a transfer report detailing the exact transactions and fees it contains.
    
*   QuickBooks + NetSuite supportAutomatically sync Stripe data with QuickBooks, NetSuite, or other accounting platforms.
    

24x7 phone, chat, and email support
===================================

*   24×7 supportOur team is here to help over email, phone, or chat. You can even get email support in 6 languages.
    
*   Technical support on DiscordChat with our technical team on the official Stripe Developer Discord server.
    
*   World-class documentationBuild using our robust technical docs. Sample code in 8+ languages.
    
*   Comprehensive knowledge baseGet fast answers to hundreds of common questions and topics.
    

Manage business operations with a unified dashboard
===================================================

*   Take action from the DashboardView payments, create billing plans, respond to disputes, and more directly from the Stripe Dashboard—no code required.
    
*   iOS and Android Dashboard appsTrack payments on the go and get notifications. Even take quick actions like issuing a refund.
    
*   Roles and permissionsTailor data access for your team to protect business-sensitive information and actions.
    
*   Collaboration notesAttach notes for your teammates on payments and refunds to give them context when they jump into the Dashboard.
    

Robust developer platform and third-party integrations
======================================================

*   Client libraries and SDKsClient libraries available in every language from Ruby and .NET to Go and Swift.
    
*   Comprehensive testing toolsThoroughly test and debug your integration before going live with a test mode environment, test cards, alerting, and more.
    
*   Developer DashboardMonitor API and webhook usage in real time, manage API upgrades, and find all our developer tools in one place.
    
*   450+ platforms and extensionsUse extensions built for the Stripe platform to automate almost every manual process.
    

Explore pricing for the full Stripe platform
============================================

Online and in-person payments, recurring billing, embedded payments, and much more.

Payments
========

A complete payments platform engineered for growth

[Start now](https://dashboard.stripe.com/register) 

#### Cards and wallets

Accept widely used credit and debit cards, prepaid cards, and digital wallets for online payments.

**2.9% + 30¢**per successful transaction for domestic cards

\+ 0.5%for [manually entered cards](https://support.stripe.com/questions/manually-entered-card-payments)

\+ 1.5%for international cards

\+ 1%if [currency conversion](https://docs.stripe.com/currencies/conversions) is required

#### Link

Autofill your customers’ saved cards and US bank account information to deliver a frictionless customer experience.

**2.9% + 30¢**per successful transaction for domestic cards

**2.6% + 30¢**per successful transaction for Instant Bank Payments

[Learn more](https://stripe.com/link) 

#### Bank debits and transfers

Accept large payments or recurring charges securely with ACH debit, ACH credit, or wire transfers.

**0.8%**ACH Direct Debit

$5.00 cap

[See more payment methods](https://stripe.com/pricing/local-payment-methods) 

#### International payment methods

Increase conversion by supporting popular payment methods around the world with a single integration.

**Starting at 80¢**for iDEAL

[See more payment methods](https://stripe.com/pricing/local-payment-methods) 

#### Buy Now Pay Later

Let your customers buy something and pay for it in installments over time.

**Starting at 5.99% + 30¢**per successful transaction for Klarna

[See more payment methods](https://stripe.com/pricing/local-payment-methods) 

#### 3D Secure authentication

Verify a customer's identity using 3D Secure, an authentication method, before an online card purchase.

**Included**with Payments

 Included at no additional charge for businesses on standard payments pricing

3¢per 3D Secure attempt for accounts with custom pricing.

[Learn more](https://stripe.com/payments/authentication) 

#### Card account updater

Keep card information updated in real time, increasing revenue and improving customer experience.

**Included**with Payments

 Included at no additional charge for businesses on standard payments pricing

25¢per update for accounts with custom pricing.

[Learn more](https://stripe.com/docs/saving-cards#automatic-card-updates) 

#### Adaptive Acceptance

Improve acceptance rates with optimized messaging, formatting, and selective real-time retries powered by machine learning.

**Included**with Payments

 Included at no additional charge for businesses on standard payments pricing

0.08%per successful card charge for accounts with custom pricing

[Learn more](https://stripe.com/payments/authorization) 

#### Network tokens

Use secure payment credentials as a substitute for card numbers to increase acceptance rates.

**Included**with Payments

 Included at no additional charge for businesses on standard payments pricing

15¢per token provisioned for accounts with custom interchange pricing

[Learn more](https://stripe.com/guides/understanding-benefits-of-network-tokens) 

#### Instant payouts

Access funds within minutes through an eligible debit card or bank account. Alternatively, pay out your funds on our [standard schedule](https://docs.stripe.com/payouts#receiving-payouts) for free.

**1.5%**of Instant Payouts volume

Minimum fee of 50¢

([Pricing differs for Connect users](https://stripe.com/connect/pricing))

[Learn more](https://stripe.com/docs/connect/instant-payouts) 

#### Disputes

Understand and effectively respond to disputes on card transactions (also known as chargebacks) through a guided process.

**$15.00**per dispute received.

Fighting rare dispute types may incur network fees.

**$15.00**per dispute countered.

Returned if you win.

[Learn more](https://docs.stripe.com/disputes) 

#### Smart Disputes

Automatically compiles and submits evidence to fight eligible disputes for you using Stripe’s AI ([public preview](https://docs.stripe.com/release-phases))

[Sign up](https://docs.stripe.com/disputes/smart-disputes) for the waitlist.

**30%**of the disputed amount won using Smart Disputes

Fee to counter disputes waived

[Learn more](https://docs.stripe.com/disputes/smart-disputes) 

#### Vault and Forward API

Route payment requests to other processors while tokenizing and storing card details in Stripe's PCI-compliant vault.

**Contact sales**Contact your Stripe representative or [Stripe support](https://dashboard.stripe.com/login?redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fsupport.stripe.com%2Fcontact%2Femail%3Fquestion%3Dother%26topic%3Dpayment_apis%26subject%3DHow%2520can%2520I%2520access%2520the%2520Vault%2520and%2520Forward%2520API%3F%26body%3DWhat%2520endpoint%28s%29%2520would%2520you%2520like%2520to%2520forward%2520card%2520details%2520to%3F).

[Learn more](https://docs.stripe.com/payments/vault-and-forward) 

#### Adaptive Pricing

Present prices in local currencies to your customers, tailoring customer experience and increasing revenue.

**Included**with Payments

 Included at no additional charge for businesses on standard payments pricing

Customers will be presented a conversion fee starting at 2%

[Learn more](https://docs.stripe.com/payments/checkout/adaptive-pricing) 

#### Foreign Exchange Quotes API

Set and manage prices in multiple currencies with rate locking for up to 24 hours.

**1%**per successful transaction

Rate locking starting at \+ 0.07%

[Learn more](https://docs.stripe.com/currencies/localize-prices) 

Custom pricing available for companies with large payments volume, high value transactions, or unique business models.

[Contact sales](https://stripe.com/contact/sales) 

Checkout
========

A prebuilt payment form optimized for conversion.

[Start now](https://dashboard.stripe.com/register/checkout) 

Accept payments made on Stripe Checkout.

*   Accept one-time and recurring payments  
    
*   20+ payment methods, 30+ languages, 135+ currencies  
    
*   Built-in conversion optimizations  
    
*   Customize with your branding  
    

**Included**with Payments

 Included at no additional charge for businesses on standard payments pricing

#### Custom domain

Use your own domain while hosting your payments page or customer portal on Stripe.

**$10.00**per month

[Learn more](https://support.stripe.com/questions/custom-domain-on-stripe-checkout-faq) 

#### Post-payment invoices

Automatically generate an invoice after a one-time purchase.

**0.4%**on transaction total

**$2.00**cap per invoice

[Learn more](https://support.stripe.com/questions/pricing-for-post-payment-invoices-for-one-time-purchases-via-checkout-and-payment-links) 

Payment Links
=============

Sell products and services across any channel—no code required.

[Start now](https://dashboard.stripe.com/register/payment_links) 

Accept payments made using a payment link.

*   Generate links directly from the Dashboard, no coding necessary  
    
*   Share across any channel and with multiple customers  
    
*   Sell products, services, or collect a donation  
    
*   Customize with your branding  
    

**Included**with Payments

 Included at no additional charge for businesses on standard payments pricing

#### Custom domain

Use your own domain while hosting your payments page or customer portal on Stripe.

**$10.00**per month

[Learn more](https://support.stripe.com/questions/custom-domain-on-stripe-checkout-faq) 

#### Post-payment invoices

Automatically generate an invoice after a one-time purchase.

**0.4%**on transaction total

**$2.00**cap per invoice

[Learn more](https://support.stripe.com/questions/pricing-for-post-payment-invoices-for-one-time-purchases-via-checkout-and-payment-links) 

Connect
=======

Embedded payments for platforms and marketplaces

[Start now](https://dashboard.stripe.com/register/connect) 

Stripe sets and collects processing fees from your users, so you don’t have to. Learn more about how to qualify for a [revenue share](https://support.stripe.com/questions/monetizing-payments-with-stripe-connect) from Stripe.

*   Hosted or embedded onboarding and verification  
    
*   International support in 46+ countries  
    
*   Stripe Dashboard or embedded components for sellers  
    
*   Dynamic risk-based KYC/AML checks  
    
*   Platform management and risk tools  
    
*   Control payout timing and funds flows  
    
*   Automate 1099 generation and delivery  
    
*   Monetize fees on each transaction  
    

**Included**with Payments

 Included at no additional charge for businesses on standard payments pricing

0.25%starting fee for platforms that deploy their own payments pricing to earn revenue on each transaction.

[See pricing details](https://stripe.com/connect/pricing) 

Billing
=======

Grow your recurring revenue

[Start now](https://dashboard.stripe.com/register/billing) 

*   Configure flexible pricing models, including subscriptions, seat-based, and usage-based billing  
    
*   Collect and retain more revenue with smart recovery tools  
    
*   Enable customers to self-manage plans with a prebuilt customer portal  
    
*   Automate billing logic and order flows  
    

Pay monthly

**Starting at $620.00**per month, 1-year contract

 Subscription and cancellation [terms apply](https://support.stripe.com/questions/subscription-and-cancellation-terms).

Pay as you go

**0.7%**of Billing volume

 Includes Billing transactions processed on and off Stripe. Excludes one-off invoices.

[Compare plans](https://stripe.com/billing/pricing) 

Custom pricing available for companies with large payments volume, high-value transactions, or unique business models.

[Contact sales](https://stripe.com/contact/sales) 

Invoicing
=========

Built for speed and scale

[Start now](https://dashboard.stripe.com/register/invoices) 

Invoicing features to get started quickly.

*   Create, customize, and send online invoices that get paid fast  
    
*   Monitor invoice statuses and easily collect unpaid invoices  
    
*   Automatically reconcile incoming payments with outstanding invoices  
    
*   Get started in a few clicks with no-code options  
    

**0.4%**per paid invoice

[See pricing details](https://stripe.com/invoicing/pricing) 

Tax
===

Automate tax registration, calculation, collection, and filing

[Start now](https://dashboard.stripe.com/register/tax) 

#### End-to-end tax compliance solution

Tax registration, calculation, collection, and filing

*   Integrate with no-code or API setup  
    
*   Monitor volume to state or country tax thresholds  
    
*   Calculate tax on 600+ product and service types  
    
*   Automatically collect tax in all US states and 90+ countries  
    
*   Register for sales tax in the US  
    
*   Automate global sales tax filings and remittance with our global filing partners  
    

Pay monthly

**Starting at $90.00**per month, 1-year contract

 Subscription and cancellation [terms apply](https://support.stripe.com/questions/subscription-and-cancellation-terms).

[See pricing details](https://stripe.com/tax/pricing) 

#### Global tax calculation, collection, and reporting

*   Integrate with no-code or API setup  
    
*   Monitor volume to state or country tax thresholds  
    
*   Calculate tax on 600+ product and service types  
    
*   Automatically collect tax in all US states and 90+ countries  
    
*   Easily file and remit taxes with summarized reports  
    

Pay as you go

No-code integration **0.5%**per transaction, where you’re registered to collect taxes

 Taxes calculated and collected on Billing, Checkout, Invoicing, and Payment Links integrations. [Learn more](https://support.stripe.com/questions/understanding-stripe-tax-pay-as-you-go-pricing).

API integration **50¢**per transaction, where you’re registered to collect taxes

 Taxes on transactions created through Stripe’s payment APIs or any payment processor. Each transaction includes 10 calculation API calls. 5¢ per calculation API call above 10. [Learn more](https://support.stripe.com/questions/understanding-stripe-tax-pay-as-you-go-pricing).

[See pricing details](https://stripe.com/tax/pricing) 

Custom pricing available for companies with large payments volume, high value transactions, or unique business models.

[Contact sales](https://stripe.com/contact/sales) 

Revenue Recognition
===================

Simplify accrual accounting with automated revenue reporting

[Start now](https://dashboard.stripe.com/register/revenue-recognition) 

Simplify accrual accounting.

*   Prepare for audits by tracing revenue amounts down to customers and transactions  
    
*   Gain a comprehensive view of all your revenue, including imported data  
    
*   Set custom rules to fit your accounting practices  
    
*   Helps you stay compliant with ASC 606 and IFRS 15  
    

**0.25%**of volume

[See pricing details](https://stripe.com/revenue-recognition#pricing) 

Data Pipeline
=============

Send Stripe data to your data warehouse

[Start now](https://dashboard.stripe.com/register?redirect=%2Fsettings%2Fstripe-data-pipeline) 

Send Stripe data to your data warehouse or cloud storage.

*   Built into Stripe–no third-party integration needed  
    
*   Automatically receive your Stripe data and reports in Snowflake or Redshift  
    
*   Historical Stripe data included at no additional cost  
    
*   Ongoing data refresh  
    

**3¢**per transaction

[See pricing details](https://stripe.com/data-pipeline#pricing) 

Sigma
=====

Your business data at your fingertips

[Start now](https://dashboard.stripe.com/register) 

Start exploring your business data.

*   Instant answers powered by SQL  
    
*   Dozens of prebuilt query templates  
    
*   Save and schedule custom reports  
    
*   Built into Stripe—no setup, no ETLs  
    

**Starting at $10.00**per month, infrastructure fee

Plus a fee per charge starting at \+ 2¢

[See pricing details](https://stripe.com/sigma#pricing) 

Radar
=====

Fraud and risk management

[Start now](https://dashboard.stripe.com/register) 

#### Radar’s machine learning

Fraud protection powered by billions of data points across the Stripe network.

*   Powerful machine learning  
    
*   SCA logic for exemptions  
    
*   Always adapting to new fraud patterns  
    
*   Device fingerprinting and proxy detection  
    

**5¢**per screened transaction

Waived for accounts with standard pricing

#### Radar for Fraud Teams

Advanced fraud protection tools allowing for greater control and customizable settings. Includes Radar’s machine learning.

*   Powerful machine learning  
    
*   SCA logic for exemptions  
    
*   Always adapting to new fraud patterns  
    
*   Device fingerprinting and proxy detection  
    
*   Block and allow lists  
    
*   Rules engine to customize protection  
    
*   Rich insights for better decisions  
    
*   Optimized manual review flows  
    

**2¢**per screened transaction for accounts with standard Payments pricing

**7¢**per screened transaction for accounts with custom pricing

Identity
========

Verify user identities with confidence

[Start now](https://dashboard.stripe.com/register?redirect=%2Fidentity%2Fapplication) 

#### ID document and selfie verification

Capture and verify the authenticity of global ID documents. Use biometric verification to match ID photos with selfies of the document holder.

*   Support IDs from over 100 countries  
    
*   Biometric ID photo verification  
    
*   Hosted verification experience  
    
*   Access extracted data & captured images  
    

**$1.50**per verification

 Charged when a user completes verification. [Learn more](https://support.stripe.com/questions/billing-details-for-stripe-identity)

#### ID number lookup

Allow users to key-in name, date of birth, and local government ID number. Validate against government and third-party databases (only available for US SSNs).

**50¢**per lookup

Financial Connections
=====================

Connect to your users’ financial accounts

[Start now](https://dashboard.stripe.com/settings/financial-connections) 

#### Instant bank account verifications

Retrieve tokenized account numbers to instantly verify bank accounts for ACH Direct Debit, payouts, and other types of money movement.

**$1.50**per successful instant verification

Micro-deposit verifications are free

#### Balances

Retrieve account balances for underwriting, financial management, or preventing payment failures due to insufficient funds.

**10¢**per successful API call

#### Account owners

Verify bank account ownership to minimize fraud when making payouts or accepting payments.

**$1.50**per successful API call

#### Transactions

Subscribe to an automatically updated feed of account transactions.

**30¢**per institution per account holder per month

Custom pricing is available for companies with a high volume of API calls or unique business models.

[Learn more](https://stripe.com/financial-connections) 

Terminal
========

Build custom in-person payments

[Start now](https://dashboard.stripe.com/get-started/terminal) 

#### Cards and wallets

Accept widely used credit cards, debit cards, and digital wallets for in-person payments.

*   Unify online and in-person payments  
    
*   Scale globally with one integration  
    
*   Customize your payment experience  
    
*   Streamline reporting  
    

**2.7% + 5¢**per successful transaction for domestic cards

\+ 1.5%for international cards

\+ 10¢per authorization for [Tap to Pay](https://stripe.com/terminal/tap-to-pay)

 Accept contactless payments without additional hardware using compatible iPhone or Android devices.

\+ 5¢per authorization for optional [point-to-point-encryption](https://support.stripe.com/questions/stripe-terminal-encryption-e2ee-vs-p2pe)

 Access PCI-certified point-to-point-encryption (P2PE) required in certain industries. All Terminal transactions are end-to-end encrypted by default.

#### Card readers

Use pre-certified card readers with cloud-based fleet management that streamlines device logistics and management at scale.

**$349.00**Stripe Reader S700

**$59.00**Stripe Reader M2

**$249.00**BBPOS WisePOS E

Custom pricing is available for companies with large payments volume, or for those who require multiprocessor support, POS integrations, or third-party credit card readers.

[Contact sales](https://stripe.com/contact/sales) 

Atlas
=====

Turn your idea into a startup

[Start now](https://dashboard.stripe.com/register/atlas) 

Incorporate your company, get your EIN, issue equity, and file your 83(b) tax election.

*   Form an LLC or C Corporation in days  
    
*   Open a U.S. bank account  
    
*   Issue stock to C Corporation founders  
    
*   Access to invite-only founder forums  
    

**$500.00**one-time setup fee (includes government fees and your first year of registered agent services)

[See pricing details](https://stripe.com/atlas) 

Issuing
=======

Create, manage, and distribute virtual and physical cards

[Get in touch](https://stripe.com/contact/baas) 

#### Card creation

Create and issue cards instantly and get branded physical cards shipped in just two days.

*   Branded card designs  
    
*   Multiple shipping options  
    
*   Issue cards through Connect  
    
*   Push provisioning to digital wallets  
    

**10¢**per virtual card

**$3.50**per standard, physical card

Custom cards subject to additional pricing. Shipping rates not included.

[Learn more](https://stripe.com/docs/issuing/cards/physical) 

#### Disputes

Understand and effectively respond to disputes on card transactions (also known as chargebacks) through a guided process.

**$15.00**per dispute\*

\*Exclusions apply, subject to applicable Law. Connect users may not pass dispute fees to Connected Accounts.

#### International payments

Support international card payments for your business or your customers.

**1% + 30¢**for cross-border transactions.

\+ 1%if currency conversion is required

If you’re a business with a large transaction volume or unique business model, reach out to discuss custom economics and interchange revenue sharing.

[Contact sales](https://stripe.com/contact/sales) 

Climate
=======

Remove carbon as you grow your business

[Start now](https://dashboard.stripe.com/register/climate) 

#### Commitments

Direct a fraction of your revenue to help early-stage carbon removal companies.

*   Direct a fraction of your revenue to help early-stage carbon removal companies get out of the lab and into the field  
    
*   Use the Dashboard to get started in just a few clicks and monitor your impact over time  
    
*   Customize and publish a webpage dedicated to your commitment without writing a line of code  
    

**Included**with Payments

 Included at no additional charge for businesses on standard payments pricing

#### Orders

Buy carbon removal tons from [Frontier’s portfolio](https://frontierclimate.com/portfolio?track=offtake) through the Dashboard or API.

*   Buy carbon removal through the Dashboard or via the API  
    
*   Buy the Frontier offtake portfolio to support a range of carbon removal technologies or from individual suppliers  
    
*   Track the full order lifecycle and receive a certificate upon delivery  
    

Buy the portfolio **3%**of order value

Buy from individual suppliers **5%**of order value

[See inventory details](https://stripe.com/docs/climate/orders/carbon-removal-inventory) 

Large payments volume or unique business model?
===============================================

If you’re a business with a large payments volume or unique business model, [reach out](https://stripe.com/contact/sales) to discuss alternative pricing options. Our teams will review your current statements and can help design a customized pricing package.

[Contact sales](https://stripe.com/contact/sales) 

FAQs
====

### How are payment fees calculated?

Stripe charges a per-transaction fee depending on the payment method used by the end customer. [More details on fees by payment method](https://stripe.com/pricing/local-payment-methods).

### Will I be charged tax?

Stripe is required to charge tax on certain products and services. Tax is charged based on your location and/ or your business/tax status, which determines whether a product or service is subject to taxes, and the applicable tax rates.

[Read more](https://support.stripe.com/questions/global-taxation-of-stripe-fees)

### Are there additional fees for refunds?

*   For businesses on standard pricing: There may be [fees for refunds when bank transfers are used](https://stripe.com/pricing/local-payment-methods).For all other payment methods, there are no fees for issuing refunds. The payment processing, connect and currency conversion fees from the original transaction are not returned.  
    
*   For businesses on custom pricing: There may be fees for issuing refunds depending on your fee schedule with Stripe.  
    

### Do you have setup fees or monthly fees?

Stripe does not charge setup fees, monthly fees, or any other hidden fees like closure fees. All fees for businesses on standard pricing are listed on our website.

### Do you offer any discounts?

Stripe offers custom pricing for businesses with large processing volumes. Eligibility varies by market.

features: Access to a complete payments platform
